keyword: how many calories in a biscuit from popeyes
title: How Many Calories in a Popeyes Biscuit?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a biscuit from Popeyes, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a Popeyes Biscuit?
assumptions: Standard Popeyes buttermilk biscuit, freshly baked, no additional toppings or butter; based on official or average reported values (~58g per biscuit).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact recipe changes; fast food items can differ. Check Popeyes app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A single Popeyes biscuit contains about 230 calories and 4g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a biscuit from Popeyes?
What's the fat content in a Popeyes biscuit?
faqs.a: About 12g total fat, including 6g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are Popeyes biscuits high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 720mg sodium per biscuit due to salt in the recipe.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a Popeyes biscuit?
faqs.a: Roughly 26g carbs, with 1g fiber and 3g sugars.

faqs.q: Does Popeyes biscuit have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0g trans fat, but check current menu as formulations change.
